text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 3 in C major, Op. 2, No. 3, was written in 1795 for Joseph Haydn. It was made public with his first and second sonatas in 1796. Tovey, Beethoven, Encyclop√¶dia Britannica Eleventh Edition The sonata is between 24 and 26 minutes long. == References == Piano Sonata 003 Category:Compositions in C major
title: Piano Sonata No. 3 (Beethoven)
